title: Tech industry calls on CRA to process credits critical for innovation economy - The Globe and Mail
description: Tech industry calls on CRA to process credits critical for innovation economy The Globe and Mail
content: For its part, the Canada Revenue Agency says 'non-critical services' such as the SR&ED program have had to take a backseat while the agency adds capacity for employees to work from home, and while it prioritizes the stimulus put in place by the federal go… [+5620 chars]
